Package uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.cache

Class AbstractCacheService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.cache.AbstractCacheService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICacheService
    public abstract class AbstractCacheService
extends Object
implements ICacheService
    An abstract service which handles all the cache interaction methods. This leaves only the getCache() method which will be fulfilled according to the cache implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      AbstractCacheService()

                                throws CacheOperationException
        Description copied from interface: ICacheService
        Add a new key-value pair to the specified cache, but only if there is no existing entry associated with the specified key.
        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:

        cacheName - the name of the cache
        key - the key to add
        value - the value to add
        Throws:
        CacheOperationException - if the specified key already exists in the cache with a non-null value
